headline: How Investors May Respond To Northern Trust’s (NTRS) $1.25B Debt Issuance for Capital Strength
summary: Northern Trust Corporation recently issued US$1.25 billion in new debt, consisting of US$500 million in 4.150% Senior Notes due 2030 and US$750 million in 5.117% Fixed-to-Fixed Rate Subordinated Notes due 2040, to bolster its capital structure and support future growth initiatives. This move underscores Northern Trust's commitment to strengthening its financial flexibility amid ongoing sector pressures and increased demand for technological investment in the custody banking space. We'll...
